questions.question: What is the Q-factor of a coil

answers.a: The ratio of the effective resistance to the inductive reactance of the coil
answers.b: The ratio of the inductive reactance to the effective resistance of the coil
answers.c: The ratio of inductive reactance to the capacitive reactance of the coil
answers.d: The ratio of inductive reactance to the total imoedance of the coil

explanations.a: You have choosen option (a). The answer is incorrect. The correct option is (b).
explanations.b: You have choosen option (b). The answer is correct.
explanations.c: You have choosen option (c). The answer is incorrect. The correct option is (b).
explanations.d: You have choosen option (d). The answer is incorrect. The correct option is (b).
